name: Core API Release 30.7.0
description: This release brings you with some bug fixes and an enhancement to our LoginRadius Core API , please see below for details:

FIXED.text: User profile was not sent by the Social Registration Cloud Connector event.
Return the error message instead of 500 server errors during Google Login.

IMPROVED.text: Implemented Force logout feature in Add Email, Delete Account, Passwordless, One Touch Login and Smart Login APIs.
